entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
